transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Good evening mam.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haanji mam.
Executive: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haanji mam boliye.
Executive: Good evening sir, main humara baat karegi thi IndiaMART head office se senior manager.
Customer: Mam ek ekra ko call laga lijiye abhi enter kar rahe hai team class.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain aap?
Customer: Ekra ko call laga lijiye mam ekra gate me karte hain account.
Executive: Achcha dusre number pe laga lu?
Customer: Nahi dusre number pe nahi ekra ko call laga lijiye ekra ka number hai aapke pass?
Executive: Achcha ekra to wo to second number pe hi hai na 70 pe.
Customer: Nahi 70 pe mera ye dusra wala hai. Usko main bata usko main aapko whatsapp hai aapke number pe whatsapp number hai aapka?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Konse number pe lagau main ekra mam ko number call bata dijiye.
Customer: Mujhe main ek minute ruko main laga raha hu.
Executive: Haanji mam bataiye.
Customer: Ekra mam ko number lagaiye mam.
Customer: 63
Customer: 63 98
Executive: 6398
Customer: 57
Executive: 57
Customer: 30
Executive: 30
Customer: 48
Executive: 30 ke baad kya hai?
Customer: 480
Executive: 30 ke baad kya number nahi aa raha sir.
Customer: Iske baad mam 48 48 30 ke baad 48 ji ji ji mam 48.
Executive: Haanji sir kar le rahi hu call abhi laga le rahi hu have a good day.
Customer: Okay mam. Chaliye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to connect the call to Ekra.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for Ekra's number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect the call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call connection, number verification
